page.title: 15THE CAR RIDE
page.content: The blue, shiny machine waits patiently. It is a lonely car standing silently and very still. The owner sits in his seat. A turn of the key and the engine roars and wheels turn slowly. Four pistons go up and down. Petrol is pumped. Fumes travel along the exhaust pipe and pollute the air. A turn of a knob and music fills the inside of the vehicle. Needles flick sideways showing the speed, the petrol and the temperature. The wheels begin to turn very quickly as the car races over the road. Trees and houses pass quickly by. The road is rough and bumpy but the car has springs and comfortable seats.A turn of the wheel inside turns two wheels outside making the car travel safely round bends and corners. One foot pressed on a pedal and the car slows, stops.
